about_the_game:
About This Game

Master Your Digital TTRPG Experience with the GameMasters Edition!

The RPG Engine (GameMasters Edition) is designed for the dedicated Game Master who seeks ultimate control and flexibility. This edition includes all features of the Builders Edition with the added benefit of hosting unlimited free players, making it perfect for large-scale campaigns and community-driven adventures.

Craft Your Unique Worlds

As a Gamemaster, take your world-building to new heights with advanced tools and a comprehensive interface. Design and manage intricate 3D maps with enhanced capabilities:

  • Build new custom maps and form them into campaigns. 

  • Advanced Terrain Sculpting: Create complex landscapes, including overhangs, caves, and detailed textures.

  • Extensive Prop Library: Access a vast collection of props and items to enrich your world- currently at 12,500 assets (far greater than the fine array given to free players).

  • Custom Characters: Develop unique characters with advanced customization options.

  • Enhanced Dynamic Control: Equip and unequip weapons and items, and import images as flat maps, signs, or standee characters.

  • Import images as flat maps, signs, or even standee characters. 

  • Equip premade and kitbashed weapons as well as items to players in your world. 

  • Unlimited Hosting: Host unlimited Base and Builder players, and bring that unlimited hosting to a game you join, providing a seamless multiplayer experience for large groups.

Engage as Adventurous Players

  • Dive into meticulously crafted 3D worlds with your friends. Experience rich gameplay features, including:

  • Exploration: Navigate through expansive, custom-built environments.

  • Character Control: Animate and control your characters with precision.

  • Assign standardized and custom characters to your players, enhancing their agency as you see fit.

  • Combat Visualization: Engage in dynamic and thrilling combat scenarios.

  • Real-Time Communication: Chat with fellow players to enhance storytelling.

  • Special Effects: Enhance your narrative with stunning visual effects.

Community-Driven Workshop Sharing

Access a treasure trove of assets and worlds through the Steam Workshop. Share and download maps, characters, items, and player sheets created by others. Our commitment to community growth ensures that Workshop sharing remains free forever.

Beyond TTRPGs

The RPG Engine's versatile interface is perfect for various creative applications, such as:

  • Brainstorming Sessions

  • Storyboarding Projects

  • Visual Storytelling

  • Level Design Prototyping

Ready to Command Your Adventure?

Download The RPG Engine GameMasters Edition today and unlock the full potential of your interactive worlds. Enjoy the freedom to host unlimited players and create without limits, bringing your imaginative visions to life on a grand scale! Aspiring Builders who promote themselves to GameMasters allow every session in which they participate to bypass all limits on inviting free users to explore the realms of their peers. A highly useful ability for highly dynamic groups!

Need More?
The base version provides an intro to The RPG Engine. Builders Edition DLC gives you more tools and the ability to bring one Base player into the party pool. GameMasters Edition makes you the ultimate GM with endless seats for Base players, even if you’re not the game’s host (they join free!).

Please note - This DLC Works best in conjunction with the Builders Edition DLC.
